meanings.definition: A person who assigns a value or score to something.
meanings.sent1: The raters carefully evaluated the artwork.
meanings.sent2: The raters at the competition gave high scores to the top performers.
meanings.sent3: The raters had a tough time deciding which movie deserved the award.
meanings.sent4: Her critical eye made her one of the best raters in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The raters' opinions can greatly influence the final decision.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who evaluate or assess something.
meanings.sent1: Our team of raters will review the new product.
meanings.sent2: The raters gathered to discuss their findings.
meanings.sent3: The raters had a lively debate about the best approach to take.
meanings.sent4: The raters worked together to reach a consensus.
meanings.sent5: The raters' diverse perspectives enriched the evaluation process.

meanings.definition: The act of assigning a rating or score to something.
meanings.sent1: The raters completed the rating task efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The raters' feedback helped improve the quality of the service.
meanings.sent3: The raters found joy in giving fair ratings to the participants.
meanings.sent4: The raters' ratings were like guiding stars for the contestants.
meanings.sent5: The raters' responsibility is to provide accurate ratings.
